SA15arhebt2u:784: liṅgagrahaṇottarakālabhāvinastu pūrvoktena prakāreṇa vyaktisādhyārthakriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya [Hbṭ_33] vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ /

SA15arhebt2u:791_0: iti jñāne pratibhasamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ na kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayatīti prasādhya anarthakriyākāriviṣayasyāpi
SA15arhebt2u:791_2: iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe mīmāṃsakairviśeṣaṇamupādeyamiti darśayannāha- "tasmād" yata evamanarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayā
SA15arhebt2u:795: anena hi viśeṣaṇenānumānavikalpasya ca prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati,

SA15arhebt2u:804: yataśca kāryataḥ tadviṣayatvāt smṛtirevāto "na pramāṇam" darśanabalotpanno vikalpaḥ /

SA15arhebt2u:811: tathā hi- yadevānagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ mahānasādāvanubhūtamāsīt tadeva pradeśaviśeṣe dhūmadarśanāt smaryate /
SA15arhebt2u:813_0: evammanyate- yat mahānasādāvanagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ prāganubhūtaṃ na tat taddeśādisambandhitayaivānumānavikalpena
SA15arhebt2u:813_1: smaryate kintu yatra pradeśe prāgananubhūtaṃ tatsambandhitayā /
SA15arhebt2u:820: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmānna bhavatīti ced āha- "vastvadhiṣṭhānatvāt" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:823: yadi vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā kathaṃ viprakṛṣṭaviṣayāyā [Hbṭ_35] anupalabdheḥ prāmāṇyam iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:824: tatrāpi pradhānādivikalpasyaiva bhāvānupādānatayā sādhyatvāt tasyā api vastvadhiṣṭhānatāstyevetyadoṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:826: ityāha- "arthakriyāyāṃ" sukhaduḥkhalakṣaṇāyāṃ yad "yogyaṃ" śaktaṃ "tadviṣayatvāt tadarthinām" arthakriyārthināṃ "pravṛtteḥ" prāptityāgalakṣaṇāyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:827: yadi nāmarthakriyāyogye tadarthināṃ pravṛttistathāpi kathaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā?
SA15arhebt2u:828: , arthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:830: tato 'rthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānatvena vastvadhiṣṭhānatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:831: idaṃ ca vastvāśrayeṇa pramāṇavyavasthāpratipādanamanadhigate svalakṣaṇa ityukte kadācit paro brūyāt- vastumātranibandhanā hi pramāṇavyavasthā na svalakṣaṇāśrayaiva /
SA15arhebt2u:835: tathā ca vastuviṣayamapi prāmāṇyaṃ bruvatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayamevoktaṃ bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:838_1: "tato 'pi" yathoktād vikalpād na kevalaṃ nīlasvalakṣaṇānubhavād "vastunyeva" svalakṣaṇa
SA15arhebt2u:838_3: pravṛtte" adhigate svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpo na pramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:843: yadi nāma tadadhyavasāyena vastunyeva puruṣasya pravṛttistathāpyanadhigatasāmānyagrāhiṇo 'sya darśanāt pṛthak prāmāṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate?
SA15arhebt2u:844: iti cet; āha- "pravṛttau" svalakṣaṇa eva satyāṃ "pratyakṣeṇa" ālocanājñānākhyena "abhinnayogakṣematvāt" /
SA15arhebt2u:849: abhinnaḥ kṣema ālocanāvijñānādiva vikalpādapi svalakṣaṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:850: ayamasyābhiprāyaḥ- yadi vikalpo nirvikalpacetasaḥ prameyāntaraviṣayastadā tatraiva puruṣaṃ pravartayatu tatsādhyāmarthakriyāmadhigantum /
SA15arhebt2u:852: tadviṣayatvābhimatasya sāmānyasyābhinnajñānalakṣaṇāyā evārthakriyāyā upagamād vikalpodayādeva ca tatsiddheḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:853: nahi nīlānubhavāt prameyāntaraviṣayāḥ pītādipratyayāḥ puruṣaṃ nīlavastuni pravartayanti,
SA15arhebt2u:859: iti / tato nīladarśanasyaiva nirvikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:860: na tadabhinnopayogasya smṛteriva vikalpasyāpi darśanāt pṛthageva /
SA15arhebt2u:861: anyathā niṣphalāṃ pramāṇāntarakalpanāṃ kurvataḥ smṛticchādveṣaprayatnādi pramāṇamanuṣajyata iti pramāṇānāmiyattā viśīryeteti /
SA15arhebt2u:865: na caivam, ato 'nekānta iti pramāṇasaṃplavavādī darśayannāha- "pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇena" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:875: yadā kṣaṇaviśeṣasādhye 'rthe hitāhitalakṣaṇe vāñchā prāptiparihārecchā yogināṃ paropakāramuddiśya bhavati kasyacit kathañcit kvacidupayogāt tadā /
SA15arhebt2u:876: yathā darśanamārge duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirddamānāmanuśayānāṃ vāsanāṃ nirodhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:880: tat eṣāṃ grāhakāṇi paracittajñānāni pṛthageva pramāṇāni /
SA15arhebt2u:881_1: bhagavatāṃ kaścidevārthakṣaṇaḥ kasyacideva parārthasyānugrāhako biabandhako veti
SA15arhebt2u:881_2: sarvabhāvān pratikṣaṇaṃ vīkṣamāṇānāmadhyakṣacetasāṃ tadviṣayakṣaṇānāṃ bhinnārthakriyāsūpayogato nānāyogakṣematvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:882: tad yadi pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇavivekadarśino 'dhikṛtyocyate tadā bhinnopayogitayā pṛthak prāmāṇyāt nānekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:885_2: rañjanādikaṃ nīlādikakārtyaṃ tatra "na teṣām" uktareṣāṃ jñānakṣaṇānāṃ "sāmarthya"
SA15arhebt2u:886: pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇaviṣaya eva tebhyo 'pi pravṛtterādyasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyam /
SA15arhebt2u:887_0: tathā hi- arthakriyārthināṃ tatsādhanaprāpaṇasamarthe jñāne pramāṇavyavahāraṃ kurvatāmaviklavadhiyāmarthakriyāsādhanabhedādeva
SA15arhebt2u:887_1: prāmāṇyabhedavyavahāro jñāneṣu yuktaḥ anyathā smṛtyāderapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ kathamapākriyeta?
SA15arhebt2u:888: , ādriyeta vā niṣphalā pramāṇavyavasthā prekṣāvatā iti? /
SA15arhebt2u:890_0: ityāha- "aparāpare" ca te "dhūmā"śca taiḥ "pramitā"śca te "sannikṛṣṭāgraya"śca teṣviva
SA15arhebt2u:890_2: yathā prāmāṇyabhedo na yukto viduṣāṃ tathātrāpi /
SA15arhebt2u:891: yadā tu pañcatapastaptukāmo bhavati tadāparāparadhūmapramitasannikṛṣṭāgniviṣayāṇāmapyanumānānāṃ sāmarthyabhedāt prāmāṇyamanivāritameva /
SA15arhebt2u:894: '; ityudāharaṇe nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya prakṛte yojayannāha- "etena" nīlasvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇena /
SA15arhebt2u:904_0: pūrvakameva svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ yat pareṇālocanājñānamiti vyavahṛta tat pramāṇaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:904_1: na tu tadvalabhāvī vikalpo yathoktena nyāyeneti sthitametat- "pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi
SA15arhebt2u:905: tadevaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmaniścayaṃ bruvatā prasaṅgena darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāt
SA15arhebt2u:913: kasmād? yataḥ pakṣadharma eva tadaṃśena vyāpta eva ca hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:914: nānya ityabhidhānāt parokṣārthaviṣayaṃ sarvaṃ pramāṇamanumāne 'ntarbhāvitamiti saṅkṣepataḥ saṅkhayāvipratipattiḥ samyagjñānaviṣayā nirastā /
SA15arhebt2u:915: tathā, vyāpakāṃśasya gamyatvapratīteḥ tadaṃśavyāptivacanena sāmānyaviṣayamanumānaṃ na svalakṣaṇaviṣayamityākhyātam tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:921: tathā, tasya dvidhā prayoga iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt parārthānumānaṃ kathayiṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:926: tatā hi- pradhānapuruṣārthopayoginastattvasya caturāryasatyalakṣaṇasyānumānata eva niścayāt tasya prādhānyam /
SA15arhebt2u:931: anubhūyamānaphalaṃ vā dṛśyamānaṃ tatpravṛttiviṣayo nispannatvāt phalasya /
SA15arhebt2u:932: tasmād yadanāgataphalaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanaṃ pratyakṣamapi tatrāpyanumānameva pravartakam /
SA15arhebt2u:933: na hi tasyānāgate sukhaduḥkhe prati yogyatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirddhārayati,
SA15arhebt2u:935: taduktam- " na hyapratyakṣe kārye kāraṇabhāvagatiḥ" iti /
SA15arhebt2u:936: tasmāt pūrvānubhūtasukhaduḥkhasādhanasādharmyāt pratyakṣaviṣayasyāpi vastuno 'nāgataphalayogyatāniścayaḥ na pratyakṣataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:941: phalamanāgataṃ prati yogyatāyā anumānata ityubhayorapi pravartakatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:942: samyagjñānapūrvakatvaṃ ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārayoraktam na tvanāgataphalaṃ prati yogyatāyāḥ pratyakṣato 'niścayāt /
SA15arhebt2u:947_1: anvayavyatirekaniścayasya tu bhinnopāyasādhyatayā bhedenaiva nirddeśaḥ kārya iti
SA15arhebt2u:947_3: 'pi" na kevalaṃ pakṣadharmaniścaya uktaḥ kintvanvayaniścayo 'pi "svabhāvahetau" ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:948: "sādhanadharma" sya yad "bhāvamātraṃ" sattāmātraṃ mugdarādinimittantarānapekṣaṃ tasya "anubandho" anugamanaṃ vyāptiḥ tasya "siddhiḥ" yā sa svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:951: yatra yatra sādhanadharmasya bhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharmasyāpi nimittāntarānapekṣo bhava ityetasyārthasya siddhiḥ svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:953: ? "tadbhāvatayā" sa sādhanadharmo bhāvaḥ- svabhāvo yasya tasya bhāvatayā tadbhāvatayā /
SA15arhebt2u:954: yo hi sādhanadharmaḥ sādhyadharmasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ taṃ nānubadhnīyāt,
SA15arhebt2u:959: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpakāle tu paramparayā tattadvayāvṛttapadārthanibandhanāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo na vihanyate /
SA15arhebt2u:960: na hyasau pāramārthikaṃ sādhyasādhanadharmayorddharmiṇaśca kṛtakatvādau bhedamavalambate,
SA15arhebt2u:962: ekārthasamavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvādeḥ sambandhaḥ iti cet; na,
SA15arhebt2u:967: samavāyād vṛttikalpanāyāṃ ca kṛtakatvādayo nityābhimateṣvapyātmādiṣu varteran /
SA15arhebt2u:968: ya eva hi kṛtakatvādeḥ śabde samavāyo yabdalāt tatraiva tad vartate sa eva nityābhimateṣvapi,
SA15arhebt2u:969: tasyaikatvenopagatatvāt ityātmādau vṛttiḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ kena nivāryeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:970: atha ‘ya evābhūtvā bhavanadharmā bhūtvā cābhavanadharmāsthirarūpo bhāvaḥ tatraiva kṛtakatvādayo dharmā vartante ';
SA15arhebt2u:972: saiva tarhyabhūtvā bhavanasvabhāvatā bhūtasya cāsthirasvabhāvatā tadviparītarūpasamāropavyavacchedaviṣayāyāḥ kalpanābuddhernibandhanaṃ kiṃ neṣyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:973: tayaiva paramārthābhedavatorddharmayoḥ sādhyadharmiṇi vṛtteḥ kimantarālagaḍunā kṛtakatvādinā vyatirekavatā upagatena? /
SA15arhebt2u:974: tathā hi- na sattāmātreṇa kṛtakatvādayo dharmāḥ sādhyadharmapratipattinibandhanam,
SA15arhebt2u:977: sa ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsinamevakāraṃ bahīrūpatayādhyavasitamanusaran kṛtakānityādirūpatāṃ vastunaḥ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:981: tad varaṃ yadeva tatkalpanānnibandhanaṃ tadeva tathāvidhavikalpaprasavanimittamastu,
SA15arhebt2u:983: tadabhyupagame ca caritārthā vyatirekavanto dharmā ityalaṃ tatkalpanayā /
SA15arhebt2u:984: avaśyaṃ ca vyatiriktānityatādvāreṇāpi vastuna evānavasthāyinamātmānaṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:987: anyathā vyatiriktānityatayā nityatvāt tadavagamārthitvenāyamanityasādhyārthakriyārthī nityaṃ śabdādikamāśaṅkamānaḥ kimanityatāvicāraṃ prati āhītāsthaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:997: asmākaṃ tu kathañcid bhedābhedavatāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā naiṣa doṣaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:1004: tato 'pi tayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedau sta eveti cet; na,
SA15arhebt2u:1006: tathā hi- dharmayostadekasvabhāvādapi bhedavatostena svabhāvena kathañcidabhedanimittamabhinno 'paraḥ svabhāvo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:1008: na ca kalpanābuddhāvanantobhayarūpasvabhāvaparamparā pratibhāsata iti kimiti tatkalpanayātmānaṃ vipralabhante bhavantaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:1009: kathañcit ca bhedopagamāt kathaṃ bhedapakṣabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāmanavasaraḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:1013: iti vyavasthāpyate yadi tena bhedastadā bheda eveti kuto 'nekāntavādaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:1021: tasmāt tattatpararūpavyāvṛttisamāśrayāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedavatāmiva dharmadharmiṇāṃ pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:1022: tanmātrānubandhastu vastutaḥ tattatsvabhāvatayaiva yuktaḥ iti manyamānena "vastutastadbhāvatayā" ityuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:1025: kā punarasau vastutastadbhāvatā yayā hetubhūtayā sādhyadharmasya sādhanadharmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sidhyati?
SA15arhebt2u:1030: tasya yā "vṛtti" pravṛttiḥ "bādhakapramāṇavṛttiḥ" tatsādhyatvācca vastutastadbhāvatāyāḥ sā bādhakapramāṇavṛttiruktā /
SA15arhebt2u:1031: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ vipakṣāt nivṛtto hetuḥ sādhyadharmavatyeva dharmiṇi vartate iti sādhyadharmasyānarthāntarasya sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:1039_0: sa ca vastutastadbhāvatayā sidhyatīti tatsiddhyupāyaṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiṃ darśayati-
SA15arhebt2u:1039_1: "akṣaṇikatve" kṣaṇikaviparyaye sati "artha kriyāvirodhāt" arthasya- kāryasya kriyā-
SA15arhebt2u:1039_2: niṣpattistasyā virodhāt "tallakṣaṇaṃ" sārthakriyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya "vastutvasya" arthakriyāsāmarthyātmana,

SA15arhebt2u:1049: evaṃ svabhāvahetau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito 'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya koryahetau pratipādapannāha- "kāryahetau" anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam /
SA15arhebt2u:1057: na ca kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvamasandigdhaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:1060: ṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu dṛśyātmakaṃ sat nopalabdhaṃ bhavati agnyādisāmagrīsannidhānāt prāk tādātmyādisāmagryāmupalabhyamānāyāmupalabhyamānaṃ tatkāryaṃ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:1069: na cāgnīndhanādibhāve niyatasannidheradṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścit dhūmasya bhāvaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkanīyam /
SA15arhebt2u:1074: pratibandhe vā tatkāryatā tatkāraṇatā vā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:1084: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānādeva ca dhūmasya tat kāraṇaṃ kalpeta /
SA15arhebt2u:1086: tadapi tatra kāraṇamastu iti cet; na,
SA15arhebt2u:1092: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:1093: nahi sarvasattvakarmādhipatyajanitatve 'pi jagadvaicitryasya dṛṣṭakāraṇahānitastatkāryadarśanād vā pravṛttānāṃ atatprāptirityalamatiprasaṅgena /
SA15arhebt2u:1094: kiṃrūpaḥ punarasau kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nupalambhasahāyapratyakṣanibandhana ityāha- "tadbhāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve 'bhāvaśca" iti /
SA15arhebt2u:1095: ya eva hi kāraṇābhimatasya bhāve bhāva eva /
SA15arhebt2u:1099: sa hi tābhyāmanyo bhavan svabhāvato 'pratipannakāryakāraṇarūpayorvā bhaved,
SA15arhebt2u:1106: yato nānyayogasteṣāṃ pūrvarūpaṃ nāśayati vināśahetvayogād vakṣyamāṇakāt /
SA15arhebt2u:1108: nahi teṣu niṣpanneṣvaniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā tatsvabhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:1109: ayaṃ hi bhedo bhedaheturvā viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaśca tataścet na bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:1110: anyanimittābhāvāt ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt ityādi prasajyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:1112: tataśca pūrvake vastunī tadavasthe eveti na tayoranyayoge 'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatāpattiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:1114: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvādanyastadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyamanubhavet? /

SA15arhebt2u:2196: tasmād bhāvini kārye prāgbhāva eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2197: sa ca sarveṣāmastīti sarva eva kāryotpattau vyāpriyanta iti vyapadiśyante /
SA15arhebt2u:2198: "tadapi kāryaṃ sarvebhya eva jāyate" sarveṣāṃ bhāva eva tadbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2199: na hi kāryasya kāraṇābhimatabhāva eva bhāvamantareṇāparaṃ janma /
SA15arhebt2u:2200: tathābhāve hi tatraiva kāraṇavyāpārāt kāryakriyaivaiṣāṃ na sambhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:2201: tataśca satsvapi kāraṇeṣu kathamasya bhāva upalabdhirvā syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:2211: tasmāt kāryamevābhūtvā hetubhāve bhavatīti bhāva evāsya tato janmeti sarvebhyastat jāyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2212_0: nanvekasyāpi tajjanane sāmarthyāt apareṣāṃ tatra sannidhilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyartha
SA15arhebt2u:2212_1: eveti na tatrapareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti cedāha- "svahetoḥ" kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya
SA15arhebt2u:2213: tataḥ "upanidhiḥ" kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ "dharmo" yeṣāṃ te "tathābhavantaḥ" kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ "nopālambhamarhanti"- ‘
SA15arhebt2u:2216: na hi tadaparasannidhimantareṇa tatraikasyāpi bhāva upapadyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2220: tataśca pratikṣaṇamupadhīyamānātiśayasyotpādāt kevalānāṃ ca tajjananasvabhāvavaikalyāt tadaparapratyayayogajanyasvabhāvatvāt samarthajanakasya hetoḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2222: tasmād yatsāmagrījanyasvabhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sa tatraikābhāve 'pi kāraṇavaikalyānna sambhavatītyekasāmagrījanmanāṃ sahabhāvo niyataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2223: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva eva kāryasya bhāvāt sarva eva janayantīti ‘
SA15arhebt2u:2240: tau cānvayavyatirekāvekatraiva kārye dṛśyete nāparāparatreti tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā gamyanta iti nāparaparajananam /
SA15arhebt2u:2241: te tu yadavasthā janayanto dṛśyante- kiṃ tajjananasvabhāvāstadaiva?
SA15arhebt2u:2244: tatra prāgapi tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi janaprasaṅga iti pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda ucyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2247: bahūni bhinnasvabhāvāni kāraṇāni kāryaṃ tvekamabhinnasvabhāvamiti "na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt" /
SA15arhebt2u:2248: tataścakṣurādayo na bhinnenātmanaikasya kāryasya janakā eṣṭavyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2249: kintvabhinnameṣāmekakāryajanakaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ rūpamupeyaṃ yenābhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
SA15arhebt2u:2250: tacca samagrāvasthāyāmeva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām /
SA15arhebt2u:2256: tato yadasya samagreṣu cakṣurādiṣu janakaṃ rūpaṃ tadekaikābhāve 'pi vidyate na ca janayatīti ‘
SA15arhebt2u:2262: evaṃ manyate- kiṃ punaridaṃ kāraṇamabhimataṃ bhavataḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2267: nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekameva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekameva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:2268: yadyevaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatānekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:2269: ekenaiva tat kāryaṃ kartavyamiti ca na niyamakāraṇamutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2273: taduktam- "tasyaiveikasya janane samarthāḥ nānyasya iti nāparāparajananam" iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2278: taccānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryamucyate tasya kuto 'nekatāprasaṅgaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2279: yattvabhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakamucyate tasyaikasthitāvapi bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvācca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2280: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vāna janayet /
SA15arhebt2u:2281: tasmād yeṣuṃ bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛṣṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2285: "yathāsvaṃ" yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvastadbhedena "tadviśeṣopayogataḥ" tasya- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
SA15arhebt2u:2287: teṣūpayogataḥ tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ- kāryāṇāṃviśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ teṣāmasaṅkarātparasparavyāvṛttarūpatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2288: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇāmiti kathanna kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:2294: tato 'pyabhrāntavijñānasambhūtiriti bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇāmasāṅkaryādastyeva [Hbṭ_94] sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2295: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣāmupayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt kathamasāṅkaryam? /
SA15arhebt2u:2300: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇāmanyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatastadabhāve tanna syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2301: janakatvaṃ hyeṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2304: nanvekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2307: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayorapi bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayorvijñānātmatā,
SA15arhebt2u:2308: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? / āha ca-
SA15arhebt2u:2317: anyādaśī ca vijñānāderiti tadvailakṣaṇyādeva kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
SA15arhebt2u:2318: syādetat- sarveṣāmanvayavyatirekāvanuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇairiti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ- ihopādānabhāve bheda(bhāveneda)
SA15arhebt2u:2325: niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2326: cakṣuḥkṣaṇāntarodaye ca pūrvabhāvinaścakṣuṣo na svavijñānayogyatāhetoḥ samanantarapratyayasya /
SA15arhebt2u:2329: pratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ tad upādānakāraṇaṃ yat santānāntare prāgavasthāpekṣaviśeṣodayanibandhanaṃ tat sahakārikāraṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:2330_0: sā ceyaṃ bhāvānāṃ svahetuparamparayātā prakṛtiryayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:2330_1: janayantyaparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanamiti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāccakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ
SA15arhebt2u:2335: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2336: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2337: tadā tasyeha bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt?
SA15arhebt2u:2343: ubhayaṃ caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭamiti darśayannāha- "yathā" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:2344: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'pyanekarūpatā /
SA15arhebt2u:2346: tatra sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati- "mṛtpiṇḍāt" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:2347_1: tadanyajanyebhyo 'bhinnasvabhāvāni yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇameva samagrāṇi
SA15arhebt2u:2348: tathā hi- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣādervilakṣaṇamevopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2351: evaṃ kulālādikamapi tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryaṃ karoti tadvilakṣaṇameva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2352: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:2353_2: tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:2354_3: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmādekaikakāryād dvidvikāryācca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
SA15arhebt2u:2354_4: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparamasaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2361_1: kāryāṇi bhavanti "tat" tasmāt "evam" uktena prakāreṇa kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitādanyasāmagryantarbhūtāt
SA15arhebt2u:2363: na mṛdaḥ kevalāyāḥ tatsāmagrībahirbhūtāyāḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kulālopādānopakṛtāyā eva mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakakāryahetutvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2365_0: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kāryasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pyanekātmatāvirahaṃ
SA15arhebt2u:2365_1: pratipādayannāha- "na ca tayoḥ" mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ
SA15arhebt2u:2365_2: yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya tadanyāvasthāviṣayād
SA15arhebt2u:2368: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
SA15arhebt2u:2372_2: parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
SA15arhebt2u:2375: na hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
SA15arhebt2u:2379: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayorekātmataiveti na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
SA15arhebt2u:2380: yato bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ ekakāryotpattivirodhādekarūpatayā teṣāṃ sādhāraṇaikakāryakriyā,
SA15arhebt2u:2383_1: ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidekaṃ nāsti tathā'nekapratyayajanitamapīti
SA15arhebt2u:2387: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayorekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhayādibhedād bheda iṣyate tatkathamanekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etadudāharaṇam syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:2388: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhayāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāccābheda iṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2390: tathā hi- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2397: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyoḥ saṅkhayādibhirbhedaḥ deśādibhistvabheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatāstyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:2398: yathā tvekatā tathā tābhyāṃ tasya abhinnātmajanyataiveti yadanekakāraṇaṃ tadanekameva,
SA15arhebt2u:2399: yat punarekaṃ tat sahakāriṇāmabhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇameveti na vyabhicāra iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2403: svabhāvato bhedopagame vāparasparātmatayā bhṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhavaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaṃ durnivāram /
SA15arhebt2u:2404: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2406: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhayādaya ātmabhūtamabhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2410: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
SA15arhebt2u:2411: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācidekavacanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2415: brīhaya iti ca jātivacane dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñciduttaram /
SA15arhebt2u:2416: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
SA15arhebt2u:2424: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇācca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:2427: na hi śaktireva indati śankoti dārayati ca /
SA15arhebt2u:2433: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācidarthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
SA15arhebt2u:2436: tathā hi- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ dravyamahrīkairiṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2440: paryāyā eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyamiti nityamabhyupagamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2441: na ceyaṃ kūṭasthanityatā vā dravye sambhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:2449: tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanivandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:2453: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2457: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatirna syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2458: kintvapūrvameva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
SA15arhebt2u:2459: tatra viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāmitaretaropadānāhitarūpabhedānāṃ sannidhau viśiṣṭasvetarakṣaṇabhāve pratyekaṃ tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhānādanekakriyopagamo na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2470: tathā hi- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣaṇajananātmakāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:2472: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhāvatā /
SA15arhebt2u:2475: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyavyāvṛttimupādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2494: ekasyānekakriyānabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:2500: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ [Hbṭ_102] naikāntiko bhedaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2501: tathā hi- yamātmānaṃ purodhāyāyaṃ dharmī paryāyāścaite iti vyavasthāpyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2504: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2511: tataśca svasantānakṣaṇamitaropādānaṃ ca yugapadupakurvataḥ kathamekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:2513: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatāmācakṣāṇa ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ?
SA15arhebt2u:2516: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedamabhidadhānaḥ sphuṭamahrīka evāyamityupekṣāmarhati /
SA15arhebt2u:2518_0: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaścaikasya
SA15arhebt2u:2526: tathā hi- deśakālayorabhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:2536: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2541: tataśca padārthadvayameva syāt na tvekaṃ dvirūpamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:2547: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san? /
SA15arhebt2u:2554: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam /
SA15arhebt2u:2557: tathā hi- śaśāṅkodayaṃ bahavo nirīkṣante tasya kathamekatvamabhyupagatam? /
SA15arhebt2u:2559: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcidapi saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:2560: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭaṃ khyāpyate,
SA15arhebt2u:2561: na punarasya bhāvato dve rūpe staḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:2562: atha punardravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavadekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvīrūpamucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:2566: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
SA15arhebt2u:2569: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:2574: iti kevalamanekatve 'pi bahuṣvekakāryadarśanāt senādivadekavyavahāradarśanakṛto 'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām /
SA15arhebt2u:2577: tathā hi paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāśca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktācca dharmadharmiṇorniṣedhānnobhayavādasambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:2607: bhinnaṃ paryāyarūpaṃ hi dravyarūpād bhaved yadi // 10 //

SA15arhebt2u:5242_0: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveṣāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane
SA15arhebt2u:5242_1: sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ hetuviviktānāṃ upalambhe sati syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:5244: yata upāyāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayorviśiṣṭayorbhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇakāreṇeti /
SA15arhebt2u:5245: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrādeva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayoreva sattā na prasidhyediti,
SA15arhebt2u:5248: ityanenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇā niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayorbhāvābhāvayoryat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttiryadyapyākṣipyate /
SA15arhebt2u:5251: tadā "tayoreva" sapakṣavipakṣayoreva bhāvābhāvayoryā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā "aprasiddheḥ" /
SA15arhebt2u:5253: ityāha- "jñānasya" upalabdheryā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvājjñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5257: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vināpi "tatsādhanaṃ" tatsattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam "ākarṣati" ākṣipatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:5258: kiñca, parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5259: kīdṛśaṃ punastacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākṣipati?
SA15arhebt2u:5260: ityāha- " trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vaḥ saṃvādakaṃ prāpakaṃ" vāñchitasyārthasyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:5261_0: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttimākṣipatītyāha-
SA15arhebt2u:5261_1: "tadrūpaṃ" tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye pratipattāro na vidanti,
SA15arhebt2u:5264_0: yata evam "iti" tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvādeva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvādeva pravartake trirūpaliṅge
SA15arhebt2u:5264_1: jñānaṃ siddhamiti yadyapi niścitagrahaṇamatiricyate tathāpi tāveva liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvau
SA15arhebt2u:5267_0: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ- tanmātreṇa
SA15arhebt2u:5267_1: vyavasthāpayanti "yata eva iti" tasmātteṣāṃ vādināṃ niṣedhārtho 'yaṃ lakṣaṇe niścitaśabdaḥ
SA15arhebt2u:5268: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt2u:5269: kimiti punarddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviṣayābhyāṃ sapakṣā [sa]pakṣayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāvanvayavyatirekātmakau neṣyete ityāha- "satorapi" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5270: satyapi kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvaciccāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane ‘sa śyāmaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:5273: tathā hi- anvayo nāma sarvatra satyeva sādhye hetorbhāvo [Hbṭ_225] vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetorabhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5274: na ca kvacit sati sādhye hetorbhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:5276: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve satyabhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyamabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:5278_1: sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārthameva niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityupadarśayannāha- "tasmāt" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5281: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tanna kartavyameveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhavatīti darśayannāha- "yato 'pi"ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5285: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetorupanayasyārtho 'vagatastasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:5286: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15arhebt2u:5290: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyājjñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam "hantaḥ" tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekācca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:5294: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ kartavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:5298: tathā hi- anvayo hetoḥ [Hbṭ_226] sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
SA15arhebt2u:5300: na ca tau parasparamākṣipataḥ parasparamantarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayorbhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:5301: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yukto /
SA15arhebt2u:5302: nanu ca yadyanvayavyatirekayorbhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgamucyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:5306: yato yathānvayavyatirekau vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo (pyete tathā tayo)
SA15arhebt2u:5311: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstītyekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpamityucyate iti /
SA15arhebt2u:5316: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktamekaṃ vākyamubhayamanvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇameva gamayatītyucyate 'smabhirnaiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt2u:5318: atra para āha- "na tu tatraiva" ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:5329: tataścaikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvapratipādakena prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagaterdvitīyavacanaṃ na kartavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:5349: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanamiti na punarekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt2u:5350_0: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ propalakṣaṇārthena
SA15arhebt2u:5350_2: punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanamastīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:5351_1: tata evaivakavākyārthāntarbhāvādityata āha- "na punaḥ kevalau" ekavākyārthānapekṣau
SA15arhebt2u:5353: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayorapi tatprasaṅga ityata āha- "niyamavantau ca" sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau "na kevalau" kintu sahitāveva /

SA15arhebt2u:5360: tathā cetareṇāpyasapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt2u:5361: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyamākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:5362: tasmād yadānvayavyatirekau bhavābhāvāvabhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāveveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt2u:5363: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyādevobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na kartavyameva /
SA15arhebt2u:5365: syānmatam- yathānvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataśca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt2u:5366: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśāstrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt2u:5373: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmādavyatirekādāgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvāditi yāvat,
SA15arhebt2u:5375: tadayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānamevocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtamiti na tallakṣaṇam /
